member.name: M:YKM.Toolkit.Core.Security.SecurityExtentions.ComputeMD5Hash(System.String)
member.summary: Computes the MD5 hash for this string and returns it as an ASCII string.

member.name: M:YKM.Toolkit.Core.Security.SecurityExtentions.ComputeMD5Hash(System.String,System.Text.Encoding)
member.summary: Computes the MD5 hash for this string and returns it encoded with the specified text encoding.

member.name: M:YKM.Toolkit.Core.Security.SecurityExtentions.ComputeSHA256Hash(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Computes the SHA256 hash for this string with the specified salt. Useful for comparing passwords with an accompanying salt.

member.name: M:YKM.Toolkit.Core.Security.SecurityExtentions.ComputeSHA256Hash(System.String)
member.summary: Computes the SHA256 hash for this string with a random salt. The salt used is returned in the result.

member.name: M:YKM.Toolkit.Core.Security.SecurityExtentions.CreateRandomSalt(System.Int32)
member.summary: Creates a random key salt of the specified length.

member.name: T:YKM.Toolkit.Core.Security.HashResult
member.summary: Stores the result of a string hash operation when a random salt is used
